item.title: Pokemon Scarlet and Violet Announce Limited-Time Paradox Tera Raids
item.description:
Highlights

  • Gamers should get ready for the new Five-Star Tera raids in Pokemon Scarlet & Violet against Sandy Shocks and Iron Thorns.
  • Sandy Shocks will be in Scarlet and Iron Thorns in Violet, with battles running from May 23 to 26.
  • Both Pokemon can have any Tera type, so players should prepare their team to resist Electric-type attacks and exploit their weaknesses.

Days after the conclusion of the Seven-Star Tera Raids against Primarina, Pokemon Scarlet and Violet players will have a new challenge against Five-Star Tera raid bosses Sandy Shocks and Iron Thorns. These version-exclusive Pokemon Scarlet and Violet raid bosses will be available for three days but will have various Tera types.

The new Five-Star Tera raids will arrive after the departure of Primarina the Unrivaled . As two of the Paradox Pokemon introduced in the ninth generation, Sandy Shocks is exclusive to Pokemon Scarlet , and Iron Thorns is found in Pokemon Violet . Like other Paradox Pokemon, Sandy Shocks and Iron Thorns are each based on Magneton and Tyranitar. In battle, Sandy Shodcks is a fast special attacker with access to moves such as Earth Power and Thunderbolt. By comparison, Iron Thorns is slower but possesses higher attack and defense statistics, and can use Earthquake, Thunder Punch, and Stone Edge to deal serious damage.

Related
Pokemon Scarlet and Violet Player Finds Trick To Get Guaranteed Shiny Pokemon

A Pokemon Scarlet & Violet bug allows players to get unlimited shiny versions of a Pokemon, and it is surprisingly easy to pull it off.

While both Pokemon can be found in Area Zero in their respective versions, Pokemon Scarlet and Violet trainers will soon have another way to catch Sandy Shocks and Iron Thorns. According to Serebii.net, the Five-Star Tera raid battles against Sandy Shocks and Iron Thorns will start on Thursday, May 23, at 8:00 PM Eastern, and end on Sunday, May 26, at 7:59 PM Eastern. Unlike previous Tera raid battles against Paradox Pokemon like Walking Wake and Iron Leaves , the Five-Star battles versus Sandy Shocks and Iron Thorns will not have a repeat run. Both Pokemon can have any type as their Tera type, and the rewards will range from EXP Candies to Tera Shards based on the bosses' corresponding Tera types.

Pokemon Scarlet and Violet 5-Star Paradox Tera Raids (May 2024)

  • Sandy Shocks will appear in Pokemon Scarlet, as will Iron Thorns in Pokemon Violet.
  • Both 5-Star Tera Raids will run from May 23 to May 26.
  • Each Paradox Pokemon will come with various Tera types.

Normally, Sandy Shocks is an Electric and Ground dual-type Pokemon, while Iron Thorns has the Rock and Electric types. In both scenarios, both Paradox Pokemon will likely start their battles by using Sunny Day and Electric Terrain to activate their abilities. Protosynthesis and Quark Drive bolster the highest stats of each Paradox Pokemon, which would be Sandy Shocks' special attack stat and Iron Thorns' attack. However, both Five-Star boss Pokemon will have their levels set to 75. A competitive Pokemon team that can resist Electric-type attacks and exploit the weakness of the Tera type at play should have little trouble taking down Sandy Shocks and Iron Thorns.

Though both Paradox Pokemon are not uncommon in their respective games, Pokemon trainers looking to farm Tera shards will have a short time to do so. It remains to be seen when the next Seven-Star Tera raid battles will arrive in Pokemon Scarlet and Violet .

item.title: Overwatch 2’s Player Count on Steam is The Best It’s Been Since Launch
item.description:
Highlights

  • Overwatch 2's player count on Steam is growing steadily, but still pales in comparison to Battle.net's numbers.
  • Recent changes, like earning Overwatch Coins through the battle pass and accessible new heroes, have boosted player interest.
  • Steam's popularity and simplicity are drawing in new players as well, suggesting a potential for community growth going forward.

It's no surprise that Overwatch 2 stands out as one of the more controversial releases of the past few years, but despite the rocky course of the game's development thus far, it's currently boasting a greater average player count than ever before on Steam. This Steam version of the game was first made available in August of last year, almost a full year following Overwatch 2 's initial release, and offers an attractive alternative platform to play the game on if players aren't willing to add Blizzard's Battle.net to their likely already long lists of game launchers and clients.

Nevertheless, Overwatch 2 's player counts on Steam pale in comparison to those seen on Battle.net. While the game has recently seen its average player count on Steam creeping beyond 30,000 players per month, Overwatch 2 has seen tens of millions of total players accessing the game each month between the game's PC and console versions. Still, the game's player count has constantly been in flux since the game was released near the end of 2022, with the infamously bad decisions made regarding the game's PvE mode driving away tons of players, but consistent seasonal content updates and occasional special events bringing many right back.

Related
Overwatch 2 Reveals New Twitch Drop Rewards

Overwatch 2 launches a new Twitch Drops campaign, revealing what rewards players will earn by watching their favorite streamers.

Player count data for Overwatch 2 made available via steamcharts.com points toward a steadily-growing community of players on Steam, and has sparked some discussion within the game's community over the past few days. Not only that, but the same data also shows that Overwatch 2 's Steam version saw its greatest peak player count since release at some point last month. While the PC community originally had no option to play Overwatch 2 beyond Battle.net , many of the thousands of PC gamers trying out the game for the first time nowadays are likely to do so through Steam due to the platform's popularity and simplicity, perhaps suggesting that the game's community on Steam will only grow exponentially going forward.

How Overwatch 2's Recent Changes Have Pushed The Game in the Right Direction

This seems to be more or less the case going by the Steam version's player count data since August, though it's important to keep in mind that such numbers may not always be entirely accurate, and data regarding average player counts are subject to change as the month goes on. Still, there are certainly a variety of factors playing into the game's rising player count on Steam, but a couple of the most notable ones can be attributed directly to a few of the big changes made to Overwatch 2 more recently .

In particular, the decision to make Overwatch Coins earnable via the battle pass and the changes made to new hero accessibility have proven to bode extremely well for the game's popularity in the eyes of many existing fans. Overwatch 2 players may now play as new heroes immediately upon their addition to the game and at no additional cost, which helped make the game's most recent Season 10 a particularly successful one.

Source: SteamCharts

item.title: Two of 2024's Best RPGs Just Got Major Discounts
item.description:
Highlights

  • Gamers shouldn't miss out on major discounts for two of 2024's top RPGs, Like a Dragon: Infinite Wealth and Persona 3 Reload.
  • Both games are highly acclaimed and set the standard for quality modern JRPGs, and are currently available at significantly reduced prices.
  • Fans can save big on physical copies for Like a Dragon and Persona 3 Reload, offering hours of gameplay for a fraction of the cost.

A couple of 2024's greatest RPGs, Like a Dragon: Infinite Wealth and Persona 3 Reload , have just received some major discounts at select retailers. Although they were released only a few months ago, both of these titles are now available at historically low prices. This is the perfect opportunity for fans of role-playing games to get these amazing modern-day JRPGs for cheap while they still can.

It's only been five months so far, but when it comes to gaming, 2024 has gotten off to a rather strong start. From indie hits like Palworld and blockbusters like Final Fantasy 7 Rebirth , there's been no shortage of quality games up to this point. Persona 3 Reload and Like a Dragon: Infinite Wealth , two of 2024's highest-rated games in particular, are some of the year's most notable highlights. Both of these titles were met with widespread acclaim from fans and critics upon release. Not only are these games some of the best installments in their respective franchises, but they also set the groundwork for what quality turn-based JRPGs should be. As great as they are, though, they were a bit on the costly side at launch, with both titles costing $70 upfront. Now, however, the two games are available at significantly reduced prices.

Related
Hit Open-World RPG Drops to Historically Low Steam Price

A hit open-world RPG with over 650,000 'Very Positive' user reviews matches its lowest-ever Steam and Xbox price as part of a new sale.

Fans of the Yakuza series can currently nab physical PlayStation copies of the franchise's eighth mainline installment, Like a Dragon: Infinite Wealth , for nearly 60% off on Woot . While the PS4 version of the game costs $29.99, the PS5 edition is slightly more expensive, with it sitting at a reasonable $34.99. Of course, Infinite Wealth 's last-gen version is backwards-compatible on PlayStation 5 , so gamers who want to save a little bit of extra money can opt for a PS4 copy of the game instead.

Getting Persona 3 Reload and Like a Dragon: Infinite Wealth For These Low Prices is a Steal

Those who are looking for anime-styled JRPGs with social sim elements, on the other hand, can look no further than Persona 3 Reload , which is currently available for $39.99 at GameStop . Fans can choose from the PS4, PS5, and Xbox versions of the game, and get them for $30 less than what they normally cost. That way, players who end up enjoying P3R can use the money they save to purchase the $35 Expansion Pass and gain access to the upcoming Episode Aigis: The Answer DLC . It's important to note, though, that both Persona 3 Reload and Episode Aigis are part of Xbox Game Pass, so Xbox and PC players can play them there instead.

Persona 3 Reload and Like a Dragon: Infinite Wealth are easily some of the best Sega-published JRPGs in recent memory, so getting them at such historically low prices will likely be worth it for many role-playing game enthusiasts. When it comes to linear singleplayer games, these two titles are also rather lengthy, so players who enjoy these types of RPGs can certainly get a lot of bang for their buck with these discounts.

item.title: Pokemon Scarlet and Violet Player Finds Trick To Get Guaranteed Shiny Pokemon
item.description:
Highlights

  • Catching a shiny Flutter Mane in Pokemon Scarlet and Violet is now a breeze with this clever trick.
  • Players can find shiny Flutter Mane in Roaring Moon Cave and Area Zero using a specific sandwich.
  • A bug in the game guarantees shiny Flutter Mane spawns, making shiny hunting much easier.

Flutter Mane is one of the most popular Pokemon that was released as part of Generation 9 in Pokemon Scarlet and Violet , and a player has discovered a sure-shot way of catching a shiny one in the game. Finding shinies is always an arduous task in any Pokemon game, but this handy trick makes getting at least one of them in Pokemon Scarlet and Violet extremely easy.

It's been an eventful few weeks for Pokemon Scarlet and Violet fans, with a plethora of events taking place in the game. Fans got two Pokemon Scarlet and Violet Mystery Gifts in a short span of time, giving them Pokemon such as Quaxly and Flutter Mane. Alongside that, there was a new 7-star Tera Raid taking place in the game as well, featuring none other than Primarina. Amid that, players have come across a bug that gives them a guaranteed shiny Pokemon.

Related
Pokemon Scarlet and Violet Players Can Claim a New Limited-Time Distribution

Pokemon Scarlet and Violet launch a new limited-time distribution event, featuring a Pokemon inspired by the Pokemon Horizons anime.

In a new post on the Pokemon Scarlet and Violet subreddit, user Xzecuter highlights a clever trick to get a shiny Flutter Mane in the game. Firstly, players will need to get a Sparkling Ghost sandwich and head to the Roaring Moon Cave during the day. At this point, the only Pokemon that spawns at that location is Flutter Mane, and due to a bug, all of them are shinies. While Sparkling sandwich helps in catching shinies by improving the odds of getting one, this trick is a guaranteed way of finding a shiny Flutter Mane.

Pokemon Scarlet and Violet Bug Gives Players Unlimited Shiny Flutter Mane

Surprisingly, another player has noted that this also applies to the bottom level of Area Zero. Just like the former, this region also only has shiny Flutter Mane spawning around provided players go during the daytime. However, what makes the trick slightly better is the fact that for this area, players don't need sparkling power, and any regular ghost-spawning sandwich should also suffice. Other players have confirmed that this works, with one of them stating that they caught a whopping three of them a few days back.

For Violet owners playing in Union Circle, the process is a bit tricky. As user OM3GAS7RIK3 highlights, this can only be pulled off if the Scarlet player eats the Sparkling Ghost Sandwich and then waits on top of the crystal near the shiny rock. The Violet player should stand on the shiny rock, as this is crucial to ensure the spawns work properly. Considering how tedious shiny hunting can be at times, this is definitely a pretty neat trick to get a shiny Flutter Mane without much hassle.

item.title: Red Dead Redemption 2 Fan Points Out How Interesting Jack Marston's Life May Have Been
item.description:
Highlights

  • As a fan has recently pointed out, Jack Marston's life would have been filled with historical events if he had survived the war and Great Depression.
  • Jack might have seen the rise of Elvis and The Beatles, the moon landing, Star Wars, AC/DC, and Nirvana if he lived into his 90s.
  • A possible Easter egg in Grand Theft Auto 5 suggests that Jack Marston could have achieved his dream of becoming a writer, with a long life being a possibility.

A Red Dead Redemption gamer is wondering just how much Jack Marston got to experience in the illustrious 20th Century. It is no secret that the Red Dead Redemption games are packed with interesting characters sporting colorful personalities, and Jack Marston is definitely one such person. Jack appears as a supporting and main character in each Red Dead Redemption title. In RDR 2 , Jack is just a four-year-old boy living with his parents John and Abigail, as part of the infamous Van der Linde gang . Unfortunately for Jack, he often gets in trouble, through no fault of his own.

In Red Dead Redemption , Jack is first portrayed as a promising young man, spending his time reading different books and aspiring to become a writer. His initially shy personality coupled with his creativity made him the polar opposite of his father for a time. Unfortunately, after the tragic events that happened at the end of the game, Jack becomes severely depressed as his attitude and behavior start mirroring that of his outlaw father. In 1914, by the end of the events of Red Dead Redemption , Jack Marston was 19 years old.

Related
Red Dead Redemption 3: Jack Marston as a Protagonist Would Be a Chip Off the Old Block

Jack Marston is the perfect fit for the protagonist of Red Dead Redemption 3 because he would carry on the legacy of his father and his crew.

A Red Dead Redemption enthusiast and Reddit user going by the name of Rutlemania raises a fascinating premise - If Jack Marston had a long and fruitful life , he could have been able to witness some of the most remarkable events of the renowned 20th Century. As a young man in the American South, Jack would most likely have enlisted in the US Army where he would have been sent off to Europe to fight in the trenches. In 1918 when the war finally ended, Jack would have returned home to experience the Roaring Twenties and a decade later, the Great Depression.

If Jack Marston had survived both the terrible World Wars and the events of the Great Depression, he would have been around to witness the rise of Elvis Presley and the Beatles. The success of these musical legends would usher in a multitude of changes, including the moon landing in 1969. If he lived into his 80s, Jack might even have gotten a chance to see the very first Star Wars film when it debuted in theaters in 1977. Just a few years later in 1979, Jack would have had the chance to listen to the first recording of ACDC’s Highway to Hell. Finally, if Jack were lucky enough to live into his 90s, he would have been around to witness Kurt Cobain’s iconic Smells Like Teen Spirit performance at Seattle’s OK Hotel.

Jack Marston May Have Been Referenced in Grand Theft Auto 5

This theory does not seem so far-fetched since one of the most popular Grand Theft Auto 5 easter eggs involves a book that was apparently written by a Marston. Players can find a blue hardback book titled Red Dead in Franklin’s Vinewood Hills house, written by someone named J. Marston. If that J actually stands for Jack and not John, it would mean that he at least lived long enough to accomplish his dream of becoming a renowned writer.
